Ester has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruits like banana, mango, watermelon, apple, and pineapple.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is a determined individual, who aims to become successful someday. She is 41 years old and has one child. She earns a living by selling dry goods, accessories and school supplies. She has been in this business for over 15 years and is happy to say that she earns about PHP 10,000 monthly. This is with the help of a man beside her, her husband. Through their patience and hard work, they have been able to support their needs. 

She is applying for a loan for PHP 50,000 to buy additional dry goods to sell such as plastic ware, school supplies and accessories. She believes that this loan will help her increase her profits, expand her business and provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional dry goods to sell such as plastic ware, school supplies and accessories.

loans.name: Tsend-Ayush

texts.en:
Tsend-Ayush is 50 years old and lives with her husband and their 3 children, in a small house, in Zavhan province, Mongolia. Two of her children work at a private company. She has been baking hand-made bread and fancy cakes with her husband since 1998. They expanded the business to an organic fancy cakes workshop in 2003. Her bread products gross 50-60% at the market and are tasty, organic, and good quality. She has many years of experience in this business. She has one employee. 

Tsend-Ayush is requesting a 5,500,000 MNT loan to expand her organic food processing and buy flour in bulk and building materials and to decorate her workplace. She said, "I would like to produce new range of organic dairy products." She is a very open and kind person.

loans.use: To expand her organic food processing and buy flour in bulk

loans.name: Relita

texts.en:
Relita is from the village of San Fermin. She is 50 years old. Relita is a single parent who has a strong determination to lift up her family from poverty. 

Relita is engaged in a food-marketing business. She has a mini-grocery store in the market, where she sells a variety of foods. She wants to expand her business. To make that possible, Relita is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 30,000 to buy vegetable oil, eggs, ginger, onions, garlic, salt and more food to sell. These additional items would help increase her sales and thus boost her profits. In the future, she wants to provide a progressive life-style for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetable oil, eggs, ginger, onions, garlic, salt and more foods to sell

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Angela tiene 53 años de edad, es madre de 6 hijos, los cuales los 4 primeros ya son mayores de edad y junto a ella viven sus 2 últimos hijos y por quienes se esfuerza mucho para poder darles una vida digna. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, asimismo desarrolla la agricultura, n especial el cultivo de espárragos, uvas, algodón, entre otros, en el mes de marzo se celebra la vendimia, en la cual se elabora el Pisco, el cual es reconocido a nivel mundial.  Cuando Angela tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho cocinar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con pato”. Angela solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser profesora.

Día a día Angela trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de golosinas en un pequeño kiosko dentro de un colegio de su ciudad, asimismo tiene un vehículo el cual alquila para realizar taxi por la ciudad; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Angela está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo como bajada del motor afinamiento, cambio de empaquetadura, entre otros y también poder comprar mercadería para su negocio como snacks, gaseosas, galletas dulces, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá tener más variedad de productos y tener un vehículo en buen estado para seguir alquilándolo, así mejoraran sus ingresos y podrá luchar para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a sus hijos y poder Tener un concesionario de venta de golosinas en todos los colegios de su ciudad”.
texts.en:
Angela is 53 years old. She is a mother of six children, of which the first four are adults and the last two live with her, and she works hard to give them a good life. Her house is located in the city of Ica, which is characterized as having a hot climate at any time of year, and also for its agriculture, especially the cultivation of asparagus, grapes, and cotton, among other things. In the month of march they celebrate the harvest, when they make Pisco (a yellow grape brandy), which is recognized worldwide. When Angela a little free time, she likes to cook one of her favorite dishes, called "rice with duck". Angela was only able to study until her fifth year of secondary school (roughly 10th grade), but she would have liked to study to become a professor.

Day to day, Angela works in her small business selling small treats in a small kiosk in a college in her city. She also has a vehicle which she uses as a taxi in the city. She believes that the reason that she does well in her business is because she is very friendly with the customers and above all because she wants so badly to be successful.

Angela is very grateful for the loans from Kiva, since thanks to the help that they have brought she will been able to maintain her vehicle in general, such as tuning up the motor, changing the changing the gaskets, among other things. She will also be able to buy merchandise for her store such as snacks, soft drinks, sweet cookies, among other things. This way, she will be able to have a greater variety of products in her store and will have a good vehicle in order to continue her success. This way she will increase her income and will be able to fight to make her biggest dream a reality: giving a good education to her children and being able to have a store to sell sweets in every college in the city.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and to repair her vehicle.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.en:
Jaime is 58, a responsible husband and father who owns and manages a bakery in Magapit. Through his business, he is able to send his five children to school. He is thankful for having his business because this is the only source of income that provides all their necessities. For two years in operating this business, he can testify for the improvement of their living conditions.

And now, he aims to improve his business and increase his income to satisfy the educational needs of his five children. He wants to ask for an additional capital of 30,000 PHP to buy flour, cooking oil, baking, salt, sugar and other seasonings to make more bread to sell. He believes that this loan will help him to increase his product offerings and income as he works hard and strives always to do better.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, baking ingredients, salt, sugar and other seasonings

loans.name: Yoeurn

texts.en: Yoeurn is 51 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in cultivating agricultural crops for more than twenty years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $6 daily. One of her children is a forest preservationist who earns about $3 each day. Yoeurn is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase construction materials to fix her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run groceries at home and help her children earn higher education degrees.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials to fix her house

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en: Sokha is 30 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Seim Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been working as farm workers for more than three years, earning approximately $6 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Sokha is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase a motorbike for carrying firewood to sell. By doing so, she would earn extra income for her family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for carrying firewood to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel  is a 30-year-old single man. He describes himself as social and customer friendly. He operates a bicycle where he provides transportation services to customers . He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located within an urban area and his primary customers are businesspeople and local residents from the environs. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the sometimes-harsh climatic conditions which can lead to disruptions in the business during rainy and sunny days . He will use the KES 20,000 loan to add to his saving and purchase a new motorcycle . His business goal is to buy a taxi which he plans to increase the transportation services  within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a family and cater for their financial needs. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to add to his personal savings and buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Aggrey

texts.en: Aggrey 24-year-old is married and has 2 children. He describes himself as a hard working man . He operates a retail business where he sells bread. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. Aggrey's business is located within a busy market  and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of cost-effective means of delivering bread to customers. He will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy bread for selling. His business goal is to run a bigger retail business of selling bread to customers within 5 years. This is his second loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more bread for selling

loans.name: Felipus

texts.en:
Felipus is a 51-year-old man who is married to Esperanza, a 46-year-old woman. They have been blessed with four children. 

Felipus is a school teacher and runs a pig-breeding business. His wife is a seamstress. They are working hard to fully cover the family's needs and their children's schooling expenses. Felipus is aware that the educational cost of the children is increasing, and to meet this need, he wants to expand his pig business. He is requesting a loan from TLM in the amount of IDR 5,000,000 to purchase 4 more piglets.  He hopes that the loan will help him be successful in this business.

loans.use: To purchase 4 more piglets

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a 26-year-old single man. He describes himself as honest and disciplined. He operates a retail stall where he sells household items such as cooking pots and plastic items such as spoons, plates, etc. He has been involved in this business for five years. 

His business is located in a growing business area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. He will use the KES 15,000 loan to buy additional household items to sell. His business goal is to improve his business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be able to better cater to his family's financial needs.

loans.use: to buy household items to sell

loans.name: Maria Carmelina

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de carne de cerdo, vive con su esposo únicamente, tiene un año de estar realizando el destazo de cerdos y la venta de carne, lo realiza con dos amigas todos los días miércoles, ya tiene clientela que es del mismo lugar donde reside y este negocio lo aprendió junto a su familia.

Ella está solicitando un crédito para realizar la compra de cerdos para que destazarlos, este crédito será un gran aporte para que ella pueda contar con el dinero y poder realizar una buena compra que le permita continuar ofreciendo carne fresca y de calidad a los clientes.

Su aspiración es tener un local en el centro de la ciudad donde pueda tener la mayor afluencia de clientes.
texts.en:
Maria works selling pork, and she lives just with her husband. She's been cutting up pigs for a year and selling the meat. She does this with two friends every Wednesday. She already has a customer base from the same place she lives, and she learned this business along with her family.

She is asking for a loan to make a purchase of pigs in order to cut them into pieces. This loan will be a great contribution so that she'll be able to count on the money and be able to make a good purchase that allows her to continue offering fresh, quality meat to her customers.

Her aspiration is to have a shop in the city center where she can have the greatest abundance of customers.

loans.use: to buy pigs to cut up.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con sus hijos y nietos, administra una sala de belleza, este negocio surgió como alternativa para adquirir ingresos, aprendió a través de una academia, hoy en dia trabaja con su hija, tienen una buena ubicación en el centro de la ciudad.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de belleza, como maquillaje, tintes, cremas, tratamientos, y otros cosméticos necesarios, con el préstamo lograra que la sala de belleza este surtida de productos que son utilizados a diario en los clientes.
Su aspiración es crecer en clientes, mejorar la capacidad del negocio, capacitarse para aprender nuevos métodos de belleza.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her children and grandchildren.  She runs a beauty salon, a business that arose as an alternative way to earn income.  She learned in an academy and now works with her daughter.  They are well-located downtown.

She’s requesting a loan to buy beauty products like make-up, hair color, creams and treatments as well as other necessary cosmetics.  With the loan she’ll manage to have the beauty salon well-stocked with products that are used with customers daily.  Her goal is to increase her clientele, her business capacity and to train and learn new beauty methodologies.

loans.use: to buy make-up, hair color, creams and treatments.

loans.name: Sulma Yanira

texts.es:
Sulma, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, a través de su esfuerzo a logrado tener el negocio en la sala de belleza, su horario de atención es de 8:00am a 5:30 pm, aprendió a través de una academia donde a través de capacitaciones aprenden este trabajo.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos como maquillajes, tintes, cremas para la piel y para el cabello, este aporte será una gran ayuda para que Sulma pueda invertir en el negocio y tenerlo competente.
Ella quiere a través del negocio poder mejorar la condición de vida de su familia, poder adquirir un vehículo de uso familiar.
texts.en:
Sulma lives with her husband and two children. Because of her hard work, she has a beauty salon business. Her hours are 8:00am to 5:30pm. She learned her trade through an academy where she was trained in this line of work.

She is asking for a loan in in order to purchase products such as makeup, dyes, skin creams and hair creams. This investment will be a big help to Sulma in investing in her business and to keep it competitive.

She wants to be able to increase the standard of living for her and her family though the business, and to be able to get a vehicle for family use.

loans.use: to purchase makeup, dyes, skin creams, and hair creams.

loans.name: Saddam Hussein

texts.es:
Saddam es un joven de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pareja y su pequeño bebé de 4 meses de nacido, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Saddam no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le gustaría mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche Mixto para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Saddam trabaja como obrero de campo en una empresa agrícola de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Saddam se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatario Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder hacer el tarrajeo, pintado y puesta de instalaciones en el pequeño cuarto donde vive; de esta manera Saddam tendrá un ambiente en mejores condiciones, que brinden mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Saddam is a 19 year old young man.  He lives in the city of Chincha with his life partner and their four month old baby.  He is a very kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person.  He and his life partner devote all of the efforts into getting ahead.

Unfortunately, due to the lack financial resources and the need to cover their expenses, Saddam was not able to study for a professional career.  However, he would have really liked to have been able to do so.

In his free time he likes to play soccer with his friends.  Sometimes he makes the delicious Ceviche Mixto to share with his family.

On his own initiative, and with much effort and dedication, Saddam works as a field worker for an agricultural company in his city.  He starts his work in in the early hours of the morning every day.  He is able to work approximately ten hours.  He believes that it is going well for him because of his good effort and because of the kind way that he treats others.

Saddam is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they provided he will be able to make improvements to his home.  He wants to plaster and paint the small room where he lives and equip it with the necessary installations.  This way Saddam’s surroundings will be in better condition, which will provide for greater security and the well-being of his family.

He will continue working and putting forth effort in order to achieve his big dream of having his own house.

loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Edwin Albeiro

texts.es:
Edwin siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y esto le ha permitido salir adelante superando las dificultades que se le han presentado en la vida. Desde hace unos 8 años comenzó a trabajar en diferentes talleres de metales, y ya hace un tiempo decidió buscar la manera de trabajar de manera independiente para poder mejorar las condiciones económicas que tiene en su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos. Con unos pequeños ahorros montó su taller de metales y así poco a poco ha venido progresando, y gracias a que ahora tiene un buen pedido, Edwin busca un préstamo para comprar surtido de metales que requiere para la elaboración de un gran pedido por parte de un cliente.

Su sueño es poder tener un gran taller de metales que sea reconocido y con el cual pueda mejorar la calidad de vida en su hogar. Además, aspira a poder generar empleo para unos familiares suyos que se encuentran con grandes dificultades económicas.
texts.en:
Edwin has always been known as a hardworking individual, a quality that has helped him overcome the difficulties he has faced in life. About eight years ago, he began working at different metal shops. At one point, he decided that he wanted to work independently so that he could improve his financial situation at home where he lives with his wife and three children. Using some of his savings, Edwin opened a metal shop and gradually made progress. Thanks to his efforts, he now has a steady level of business. Edwin is requesting a loan so that he can buy a supply of metals that he needs to complete a large order for one of his customers.

His dream is to have a successful metal shop that is recognized so that he can improve his quality of life at home. In addition, he plans to create jobs for some his relatives who are dealing with great financial difficulties.

loans.use: to buy metals so that he can complete a large order.

loans.name: Nang

texts.en: Nang is 24 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband runs the business of purchasing charcoal to resell. He earns about $10 per day. Nang is requesting a loan of $600 to pay for repairing her husband’s vehicle, which is used for transporting charcoal to sell. This money will help her husband provide his product faster to the clients. In the future, she would like to expand the business and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to pay for repairing her husband's vehicle, which is used for transporting charcoal to sell

loans.name: Erika Lissette

texts.es:
Erika, se dedica a atender una tienda y venta de pupusas, además es empleada, tiene variadas sus fuentes de ingreso, el negocio está instalado en su casa, en ella colabora su familia para atender a la clientela, es madre de un niño que vive con ella.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para la tienda como boquitas, galletas, dulces, bombones, tambien en la pupuseria como aceite, condimentos, chicharrón, el préstamo será muy útil para que Erika aumente la capacidad del negocio, mejore sus ventas.
Su propósito es mejorar la capacidad para atender a los clientes, con las ganancias comprarse algunos bienes del hogar.
texts.en:
Erika works tending to her store and selling pupusas [filled, grilled corncakes] and she’s also an employee; she has varied sources of income.  Her business is home-based and her family cooperates in providing customer service.  She’s the mother of a son who lives with her.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy merchandise for the store like snacks, cookies, candy, bonbons and oil, condiments and fried pork for the pupusa shop.  The loan will be very useful so that Erika can increase business capacity and improve sales.  Her objective is to improve capacity to tend to customers and to use profits to buy some household goods.

loans.use: to buy snacks, cookies, candies, bonbons, oil, condiment and fried pork.

loans.name: Norma Esperanza

texts.es:
Norma, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 12, 6 y 4 años de edad, ellos son dependientes económicamente de ella y del esposo, ambos trabajan por la parte de Norma se dedica a la venta de granos básicos, lo aprendió hace seis años, su horario es de 6:00am a 8:00pm, todos los días de la semana, este negocio lo tiene instalado en su casa de habitación.
Solicita un préstamo para poderlo invertir en la compra de maíz, frijol, arroz, aceite, café y detergentes, que son parte de los productos que ofrece a la clientela, esto ayudara para que Norma pueda tener más disponibles los granos básicos.
Su aspiración es que los clientes puedan mantener la preferencia por el negocio, aumenten la cantidad de estos, tambien en su familia quiere poder comprarse un vehículo para poder transportar la mercadería.
texts.en:
Norma lives with her husband and three children, ages 12, 6, and 4, who depend on her and her husband for financial support.  They both work selling basic grains from 6:00am to 8:00pm every day and have for six years.  They run this business out of their home.

She is asking for a loan to invest in corn, beans, rice cooking oil, coffee, and detergents, which are some of the products that she offers.  This will help Norma have more grains available.

Her aspiration is to be able to keep her customers, increase their number, and for her family to be able to buy a vehicle so that they can transport their merchandise.

loans.use: to stock her store,

loans.name: Ana Francisca

texts.es:
Ana, administra un comedor, tiene tres hijos  los cuales viven con ella y con su esposo, ella tiene desde hace 10 años el comedor, tambien ofrece pupusas, el horario es de 6:00am a 6:00pm, su ventaja es la ubicación que es adecuada.
Solicita un préstamo  para la compra de productos para el negocio, como aceite, azúcar, frijoles, carnes, condimentos, entre otros productos que son necesarios para la atención de los clientes, además le permitirá tener a la mano variedad para los menús.
Su objetivo con el préstamo es fortalecer el negocio, contar con lo más necesario para la comida, ya que de esto dependen las ventas y los ingresos para el hogar, su objetivo es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana runs an eatery. She has three children who live with her and her husband. She has had the eatery for 10 years, and also sells pupusas (Salvadoran stuffed tortillas). Her hours are from 6:00am to 6:00pm. The advantage she has is her location, which is ideal. 

She is applying for a loan to buy products for the business, such as cooking oil, sugar, beans, meats, condiments, and other products that are necessary for serving the customers. In addition, it will allow her to have at hand a variety of ingredients for the daily specials. 

Her objective with the loan is to build up the business, and to have what is most necessary for the meals, as her sales and her household income depend on this. Her goal is to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, sugar, beans, meats and condiments.

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es: María de 36 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como agricultor, así mismo vive con tres hijos los cuales se dedican a estudiar. María también es agricultora y se dedica a sembrar maíz y frijoles, para luego comercializar y para el consumo familiar, este es arduo trabajo que realizan en conjunto con su esposo y gracias al cual han podido salir adelante. María también comercializa leña en su casa de habitación, lo que le ayuda a contar con unas ganancias extras. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar y así mismo pesticidas para mantener alejados a los insectos que puedan dañar su cosecha.
texts.en: Maria is 36 years old and lives with her husband who works as a farmer. She also lives with her three children who are all in school. Maria is also a farmer and works sowing corn and beans both to sell commercially and for her family to eat. This is difficult work that she does along with her husband, and thanks to which they've been able to come out ahead. Maria also sells firewood from her home, which helps her to be able to count on some extra earnings. She is requesting a loan from INTEGERAL, with which she will buy a greater quantity of seeds to sow, and also pesticides in order to keep away the insects that might damage her harvest.

loans.use: to buy corn to sow.

loans.name: Namutamba Twekembe Youth Group

texts.en: Frank's shrewdness saw him into the business of selling goats six years ago. He works every day of the week to maximize profits. He wants a loan of 500,000 Ugandan shillings to buy a few bulls that he will fatten and then sell in 3 months at a higher price. His dream is to become self-reliant. He is, however, challenged by diseases, shortage of grazing land and an unreliable market. With the help of this loan, he has been able to meet his family obligations and pay school fees for his children. The ninth person in the photo 4th from the left behind wearing an ID is the Ugafode staff in charge of the group. He consented to be published.

loans.use: to buy bulls for fattening

loans.name: Shahida's Group

texts.en:
Shahida is a 29-year-old hardworking woman who lives in Punjab, Pakistan with her husband and two daughters. Her husband is jobless. Since 2004 Shahida has been running a beauty salon, which is the only source of income for the family. It is very difficult for her to pay for all of the household expenses. As a member of a 7-person lending group, she has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase cosmetic products like lipstick and facial creams, as well as chairs and tables, for the salon. With the profits she will first pay back her loan to Kiva, and then she will purchase a variety of cosmetic products for the salon to extend her business. Shahida dreams of owning her own house, as she is living in a rented house with her family. She is currently facing water storage problems in the area where she is living. She wants to thank all the BRAC staff for being so cooperative.

Note: In the picture Shahida is holding her BRAC passbook in her hand.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetic products and furniture for her beauty salon

loans.name: Sizario

texts.en: Sizario is an old client in the institution who applied for a loan of 1,000,000. He runs a small retail shop in a trading centre and has been doing this for more than four years. The purpose of the loan is to construct a simple house for his family and to restock his shop so that he can raise money to maintain his family, pay school fees for his siblings and develop himself. Sizario is an honest and very hard working man but is always limited by capital. His dream is opening a supermarket in the city centre where he says turnover and profit margins are higher than where he is currently operating. Sizario faces several problems including poor means of transport, fluctuating prices for his products, which frustrates his customers and customers who receive credit and refuse to pay back. However, his biggest problem is limited capital, which hinders him from buying all the products that his customers want. With this loan, he is hopeful that the situation will improve gradually.

loans.use: To construct a simple house and buy items for the shop

loans.name: Oliva

texts.en: Oliva lives in West Point. She is 25 years old, single, and has a child aged four years old that is in school and lives at home. From 2009 Oliva has been selling  palm oil  by the gallon  in the market. She received a little amount from her father to start her business, and learned this way of selling from her mother. She likes her business because she makes a profit. She is  requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil   for her  business, and her  plan is to build  a house.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil   for her  business

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a married man with a family of four. He is a farmer who keeps local cows and grows passion fruits on a small scale for sale as his major sources of income. James has been in this business for the last six years and has experience in it. He, however, does not have enough capital and that is why he applied for a loan. Only 500,000 Ugandan shillings was approved. The purpose of this loan is to buy some cows which will boost his business so that he may be in position to take care of his family. His main customers are people from nearby markets and schools. James faces challenges of vagaries of weather and a lack of enough capital.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Julio Ernesto

texts.es: Julio de 24 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja como empleada doméstica y junto a su pequeño hijo de un año de edad. Julio trabaja como jornalero para su padre, y así mismo se dedica a labrar su propia parcela sembrando maíz y frijoles, para poder contar con más ganancias se dedica a trabajar en una fábrica de forma eventual lo que le ayuda mucho a la economía  de su hogar. Julio solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder invertir en la compra de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, así mismo para comprar rociadores para el veneno de insectos y abono. Con esto espera mejorar en gran manera sus ganancias y aprovechas al máximo su parcela.
texts.en:
Julio is 24 years old. He lives with his wife, who works as a domestic, and with his small one-year-old son. Julio works as a day laborer for his father, and also farms his own parcel of land, growing corn and beans. In order to have more earnings, he works occasionally at a factory, which greatly helps the  finances of his household. 

Julio is applying to Integral for a loan, in order to invest in the purchase of corn and beans for planting, as well as to buy sprayers for insecticide and fertilizer. With this, he hopes to greatly improve his earnings and make the very best use of his parcel of land.

loans.use: To buy corn and beans for planting.

loans.name: Leonzo Antonio

texts.es: Leonzo de 40 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada al bienestar de su familia, él vive junto a su esposa y cuatro hijos que estudian y así mismo le ayudan con el trabajo. Leonzo se ha dedicado toda su vida a la compra, crianza y venta de ganado vacuno, obteniendo a lo largo de los años con mucha experiencia lo que le permite contar con varios clientes los cuales constantemente le compran las reces. Leonzo solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar unos novillos para terminar de criar y poder invertir en ellos y comercializarlos a un precio mayor. Esto le permite seguir incrementando su negocio y de esta forma percibir mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Leonzo is 40 years old, and a very hardworking person dedicated to the well-being of his family. He lives with his wife and four children who go to school and also help him with the work. Leonzo has worked all his life in the buying, raising, and selling of cattle, and through the years he has obtained a lot of experience that allows him to count on various customers who always buy his cattle. Leonzo is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, with which he'll be able to buy some young bulls in order to finish raising them and be able to invest in them and sell them for a higher price. This will allow him to continue growing his business and in this way receive greater earnings.

loans.use: to buy young bulls to raise.

loans.name: Dimas Leonardo

texts.es:
Dimas, tiene 42 años de edad, vive con su esposa, tienen cuatro hijos, Dimas se dedica a la venta de electrodomésticos, realizando la venta con los clientes al crédito y al contado, tiene 15 años de experiencia en este negocio, lo aprendió de sus padres.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de gaveteros, plásticos, colchonetas, ventiladores, cocinas, licuadora,  estos electrodomésticos son los que con normalidad vende a los clientes, espera que los fondos del préstamo le permitan al menos comprarse uno de cada electrodoméstico, para poder salir a venderlos.
La aspiración de Dimas es fortalecer mas el negocio, espera que con la ayuda del crédito realizar una buena inversión, mejorando los ingresos para la familia.
texts.en:
Dimas, 42, lives with his wife; they have four children.  Dimas sells home appliances both for cash and on credit.  He has 15 years’ experience in this business having learned it from his parents.  

He’s requesting the loan to buy lockers, plastics, mattress pads, fans, stoves and blenders.  These are the home appliances he normally sells to customers.  He hopes funds from the loan will allow him at least to buy one of each to go out and sell.  His hope is to strengthen the business and hopes that with the loan’s help he will be able to make a good investment thus improving his family’s income.

loans.use: to buy lockers, plastics, matress pads, fans, stoves.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en:
Luciana is 59 years old and married with one child.

Luciana works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30,000 Philippines pesos loan through NWTF to purchase additional items for her store.

Luciana has been in this business for 38 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Luciana aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items for her store.

loans.name: Rona

texts.en:
Rona is 37 years old and married with three children. Rona works very hard to provide for them.

Rona runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 Philippines pesos loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Rona has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Rona would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 48 years old and married with five children.

Josephine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Josephine has been in this business for five years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Josephine aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Risueñas Group

texts.es: Risueñas es un grupo pequeño y emprendedor, compuesto por 5 mujeres que solo quieren alcanzar sus sueños y sacar a sus familias adelante. Lisbeth es una mujer joven de 25 años de edad vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo de 2 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada en mercados rodantes y el crédito la ayudara para comprar mas ropa de temporada de frio. Ella desea tener su propia tienda de ropa en su casa para poder atender su negocio sin tener que descuidar a su hijo.
texts.en: “Risueñas” is a small enterprising group made up of five ladies who only want to achieve their dreams and get their families ahead.  Lisbeth is a 25 year old young woman who is in a live-in relationship and has a two-year old son.  She sells new and used clothing in the surrounding markets and this loan will help her buy clothing for the cold climate.  She would like to have a store of her own in her home so that she can tend to her business while she cares for her son.

loans.use: Coprar mas ropa de temporada de frio.

loans.name: Gervin Rolando

texts.es: Gervin de 26 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y un hijo menor de edad por quienes trabaja muy duro para darles lo mejor en la vida. Gervin trabaja cultivando frijoles, los cuales son la comida básica de este país por lo que cuentan con compradores fijos durante todo el año lo que lo hace un negocio muy estable. Él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el fin de comprar insumos agrícolas como: pesticidas, abono, rociadores, y otros instrumentos más que le ayuden a facilitar el proceso de siembra y así mismo incremente la cantidad de producción, lo que es de mucho beneficio para su hogar.
texts.en:
Gervin is 26 years old. He lives with his wife and a minor son, for whom he works very hard, in order to give them the best in life. Gervin works growing beans, which are the staple food of this country, so that they have regular buyers all year long. This makes it a very stable business. 

He is applying to Integral for a loan, with the aim of buying agricultural supplies, such as pesticides, fertilizer, sprayers, and other tools that help to facilitate the planting process and also increase production quantity; which is of great benefit to his household.

loans.use: To buy pesticides and fertilizer for his bean crop.

loans.name: Jose Samuel

texts.es: José de 40 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable que cuenta con muy buenas referencias por ser trabajador. Él vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad. José trabaja arduamente como agricultor siendo el único proveedor de su hogar, por lo que da lo mejor de sí para salir adelante. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar semillas de maíz y frijol para sembrar, pesticidas, abono y cilindros de aluminio para guardar los granos y mantenerlos frescos mientras los comercializa. El mayor deseo de José es darle lo mejor a su familia y poder proveerles de todo lo necesario, lo cual logrará gracias a dicho préstamo.
texts.en:
José, 40, is very responsible person who has very good references because he’s very hardworking.  He lives with his wife and two minor children.  José works hard in agriculture; he’s his family sole income provider which is why he gives his best in order to move forward.  

José is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds to plant as well as insecticide, manure and aluminum silos to store the grains and keep them fresh while he sells them.  José’s greatest wish is to give his family the best and be able to provide them with what’s needed, something he’ll be able to attain thanks to said loan.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds to plant.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 41 years old and she lives in Airport with her eight children. She is a widow. 

For the past five years she has been selling rice, pepper, okra, oil, etc., in the community. She started her business with money given to her by her brother. 

She likes her business because it provides her needs. She requesting a loan to purchase oil, rice, pepper, okra, etc., for her business. Her plan is to live a good life.

loans.use: to purchase oil, rice, pepper, okra, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Sai

texts.en: Sai is 27 years old. She is married and resides with her four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been running a business purchasing creels (wicker baskets) to resell for more than five years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband is a construction foreman. He earns about $8 each day. Sai is requesting a loan of $1,000 to pay the wages of her husband’s construction staff. In the future, she would like to expand the business and help her children earn bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she plans to build a new house next year.

loans.use: to pay the wages of her husbnad's construction staff

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
La señora Natalia ya es clienta distinguida para KIVA pues este será su cuarto crédito, ya ha tenido tres más los cuales los ha pagado puntual. Su negocio ha tenido mucha mejora gracias a los préstamos que ha obtenido.
La señora Natalia es originaria de estado de Veracruz, pero tiene ya mas de veinte años radicando en la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo, entre sus ingresos del negocio y el sueldo de su esposo el señor Fernando han podido salir a delante, y sus dos hijas han podido tener el estudio necesario para que sean unas triunfadoras.
Esta solicitando el préstamo para invertir en compra de mercancía de su negocio ya que se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y perfumería por medio de un catalogó, y le están ofreciendo los productos a un buen precio y desea invertir para estar preparado para la temporada navideña tener producto en existencia para sus clientes.
Con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio será para pagar el crédito y que con el sueldo que recibe  como chofer de un camión de carga, será para los gastos familiares y escolares de sus hijas.
La señora Natalia espera contar nuevamente con su cooperación en este crédito ya que es para mejor su negocio y los ingresos de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Natalia is already a distinguished client of Kiva since this will be her fourth loan. She had three previous loans that she repaid on time. Her business has undergone great improvements thanks to the loans she has received.

Sra. Natalia is originally from the State of Veracruz. More than 20 years ago, she moved to the city of Nuevo Laredo. Between the profits from her business and her husband Fernando’s salary, she is able to move her family forward and provide her two daughters with everything they need for their studies so that they can become successful.

Natalia is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business. She sells beauty products and perfumes through a catalog. The products are being offered at a good price, so she wants to be prepared for the Christmas season and have products available for her customers. The earnings generated from her business will be used to repay the loan. The salary her husband earns as a cargo truck driver will be used to pay the family expenses and the school fees for their daughters.

Sra. Natalia hopes to renew the assistance she received through this loan so that she can improve her business and her family’s income.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and perfumes.

loans.name: Thin

texts.en: Thin was born in 1959. She has three children who are adult and have been working. Her husband had a stroke of apoplexy and is unable to work. Thin sells beef in the market for a living and earns 3,000,000 VND per month. This amount is the total earnings of her family per month. She has taken part in SEDA's crediting program since 2008. The last cycle, she borrowed 9,184,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy more beef for selling.

loans.use: to buy more beef for selling.

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
Danilo is a hog raiser within his local community. He is industrious and a business-oriented man. According to him, farming has been the main source of income of his family.Danilo is married and has five children. His eldest is married; the second child is an Overseas Filipino Worker and the other three children are still studying.

Danilo manages his hog raising business, fishpond and farming business. He is grateful because his gained profits were used for their daily needs, allowances for the children and maintenance of their farming business. Danilo raised three hogs; he plans to buy an additional three piglets but his capital isn't adequate so he requested a loan of PHP 25,000. This amount would really help him most especially in making his raised hogs healthy and with proper growth upon reaching their maturity. He is hoping for continuous improvement of his hog raising business so he can let his three children finish their studies and be able to have a better way of living.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and three piglets to be raised

loans.name: Gaudiosa

texts.en:
Gaudiosa is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a business buying and selling lumber in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 23000 through NWTF to buy lumber and sell to customers.

NWTF is displaying Gaudiosa's previous business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more lumber for resale.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is 52 years old and is married. She is a very responsible mother who seeks to meet the needs of her family. Gilda has a retail store where she sells a variety of products to her community. Aside from the retail store, she also manages their land with the help of her spouse. 

Gilda is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional products such as drinks, snack foods, noodles and spices for her store. She wishes that in the future her business will expand to provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy drinks, snack foods, noodles and spices for her store.

loans.name: Ana Sonia

texts.es: Ana de 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, ella es muy conocida en la zona ya que ha vivido en el mismo lugar toda su vida, y cuenta con muy buenas referencias. Desde muy pequeña Ana se ha dedicado junto a su familia a la siembra de café, el cual es un grano muy importante para la economía de este país y es uno de los oficios más antiguos de esta región. Así mismo Ana cultiva guineos los cuales comercializa junto al café. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar pesticidas adecuados para combatir diferentes plagas del café, ya que desea poder brindar la mayor calidad posible, así mismo abono y todos los elementos necesarios para realizar una mejor cosecha. Ana espera mejorar en gran manera sus ganancias lo que es muy positivo para su familia.
texts.en:
Ana, 56, lives with her husband and children.  She’s very well-known in the zone because she’s lived here her entire life and has very good references.  Since she was very young, Ana has worked alongside her family growing coffee which is a very important grain for this country’s economy and one of the oldest occupations in the this region.  Ana also grows bananas that she sells alongside the coffee.

She’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy pesticides that are designed to combat various coffee infestations because she wants to provide the best possible quality as well as manure and all other supplies needed to produce a good harvest.  Ana hope this way to improve her profits which is very positive for her entire family.

loans.use: to buy pesticide.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa, tienen tres hijos, vive con su madre, la edad de sus hijos es de 8, 6 y 4 años de edad, él es un agricultor dedicado a la siembra desde hace varios años la realiza para poder vender de la cosecha y generar ingresos a su hogar en parte.

Esta solicitando credito esta por que inicia la nueva siembra y para ello necesita compararse abono semílla y herbicidas, espera mejorar la calidad de su producción al aplicar estos materiales en el momento adecuado, que le permite tener una mejor producción.

Su aspiración es a futuro puedan tener una vivienda propia donde poder vivir  con sus hijos y su esposa.
texts.en: José lives with his wife and they have three children.  He also lives with his mother.  His children’s ages are 8, 6 and 4 years.  He’s been working in agriculture for several years; he does this in order to sell his crops and generate part of his household’s income.  He’s requesting this loan because the new planting season is starting and he needs to buy manure, seeds and herbicide.  He hopes to improve his crop quality by applying these materials at the right moment allowing him to have better crop yields.  His hope for the future is to own a house where he, his wife and his children can live.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds and herbicide.

loans.name: Sonia's Group

texts.en:
Sonia is a 32-year-old woman living in Punjab, Pakistan with her husband and two sons. Her husband works for a private company and her sons are four and five years old, respectively. 

Since 2010, she has been running a cosmetics shop by herself. She sells hair care products, skin products, creams, bleaching and whitening creams, hand lotions, manicure and pedicure products and a variety of other products in her shop. As customers' demand is increasing day by day, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for the shop.  

For that reason, Sonia, as a member of a four-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of the loan,  she will not only purchase a variety of products for the shop but she will also pay the shop rent and meet the household expenditure as well.

She is very thankful for BRAC and Kiva.  

Note: The woman in red is Sonia.

loans.use: To variety of purchase cosmetic products for her shop.

loans.name: Excelsa

texts.en:
This is Excelsa, 56, a resident of Payatas, Philippines. She is married to Rey, an engineer and the father of her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Excelsa operates a piggery. She earns money by selling live hogs to meat dealers. Sometimes they have the pigs slaughtered and sold in the market.  Aside from this, she also cooks breakfast meals for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 1,200 PHP in sales every week.

To help her continue the operation of her business, she is requesting a loan of 17,000 PHP. She will use the loan to buy feed and additional hogs. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Excelsa hopes that her business will continue to be successful and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for feeds and hogs.

loans.name: Lutbayar

texts.en: Mr. Lutbayar is 44 years old and lives with his wife and four children in a ger in Zavhan province, Mongolia. His wife, Munhtuya, is unemployed. His older son, Hishigdorj, is 18 years old. He is a college student. His older daughter, Ariuntuya, is seven years old. She is a primary school student. His younger daughter and son, Ariunbayar and Ariunsaihan, are toddlers in kindergarten. He started his business in 1997 by making Mongolian traditional boots at home. His business is going well and he has collected 15 years of business and work experience. He plans to expand his business in the future. He is an honest and hardworking person. He needs 600,000 MNT to buy raw materials and inventories for his business.

loans.use: To buy raw materials and inventory

loans.name: Chan Vida

texts.en: Chan Vida is 41 years old. She is widowed and resides with her mother and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling desserts for more than 10 years, earning approximately $8 daily. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $5 each day. Chan Vida is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase construction materials to fix a house to rent. By doing so, she would have a good house to rent and earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to fix a house to rent

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more coconuts to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Mujeres Soñadoras Group

texts.es:
Este grupo tiene 8 ciclos con nosotros, son mujeres trabajadoras y que no les gusta darse por vencidas y si a veces las cosas se ponen medio pesadas, ellas salen adelante ayudándose entre si.
Teresa es una de las integrantes de este grupo ella tiene 3 hijos, de 26, 23 y 8 años de edad, los primeros dos están casados y con hijos  el tercero estudia la escuela primaria. Su esposo es chofer y ella tiene su negocio de venta de pan y champurrado cuando hace frio y cuando hace calor ella vende bollos , fritos, duritos etc. 
Con nuestros créditos Tere compró una estufa porque la que tenia le estaba fallando y un refrigerador que congelara bien. Tere quiere salir adelante y luchar por su familia.
texts.en:
This group has been with us for eight cycles and is made up of hardworking women who don’t like to give up.  If things get a little difficult, they get ahead by helping one-another.

Teresa is one of the group’s members and has three children, ages 26, 23, and 8.  The two oldest are married with children and the third attends elementary school.  Her husband is a driver and she has a business where she sells bread and chamburrado (hot chocolate) when it’s cold.  When it’s hat she sells buns, cheese curls, tortilla chips, etc.

Tere was able to buy a stove through one of our loans, because the one she had was starting to fail.  She also bought a refrigerator because the one she had did not freeze well.  Tere wants to get ahead and work for her family.

loans.use: to buy a stove and refrigerator

loans.name: Ana Elsy

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su esposo y tiene tres hijos de 24, 18 y 16 años, tienen una granja de pollos, de este negocio mantienen algunos ingresos para el hogar, tiene un año de estarlo atendiendo, lo inicio junto a su esposo por iniciativas propias.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de pollos pequeños de engorde, tambien comprara pulimento y concentrado, esto le ayudara a mejorar la capacidad de la granja y a tener mas pollos, espera tener un buen resultado y tener mas ganancias.
La aspiración de Ana es a través del negocio y su buena administración, poder crecer económicamente con su familia, tener una vida mas digna y que sus hijos puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her husband and has three children, ages 24, 18, and 16. She has a chicken farm, and from this business has an income for her home. She has been doing this for a year, and started off with her husband on their own initiative.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy small chickens to raise, and also to buy chicken feed. This will help her to increase the capacity of the farm and to have more chickens. She hopes that this will bring a good result and a higher income.

Ana's aspiration is to be able to grow economically with her family via the good administration of her business, and to have a more dignified life. She also wants her children to be able to have a better life.

loans.use: to purchase small chickens to raise, and also to buy chicken feed.

loans.name: Adalberto

texts.es:
Adalberto, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, está casado y tiene tres hijos de las edades de 9, 12 y 16 años, y está dedicado desde hace 30 años al trabajo en la agricultura, realizando todos los días desde las seis de la mañana hasta las tres de la tarde esta actividad, aprendió con su padre y hasta la fecha no ha presentado ningún inconveniente sino que al contrario le ha permitido mantener a su familia el alimento necesario.

Solicita un préstamo para poder invertir en la compra de abono y herbicidas, que son necesarios para que las siembras de maíz y frijol se protejan de las plagas, la cual se dispone a realizar en este tiempo, este préstamo ayudará a que el mantenga todos los insumos necesarios para poder llevar el alimento a su familia, tiene la esperanza de que la producción sea abundante y sana.

Su objetivo con el préstamo es poder mantener una buena producción de sus terrenos, con esto poder ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios y al mismo tiempo cubrir las necesidades diarias de todo el hogar.
texts.en:
Adalberto works growing corn and beans.  He’s married and has three children who are 9, 12 and 16 years of age. He’s been working in agriculture 30 years working every day from 6 in the morning until 3 in the afternoon.  He learned from his father and to date has had no problems; on the contrary, he’s been able to support his family and provide them with the necessary food.

He’s requesting a loan to buy manure and herbicide that are needed in order to protect the corn and bean crops from infestations.  He’s preparing to do this at this time.  The loan will help him have all the necessary supplies to provide food for his family; he hopes his harvest will be abundant and healthy.

His goal with the loan is to keep his land producing well to help his children with their schooling while at the same time covering all his home’s daily needs.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Santos Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Santos, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, por la necesidad de comprar más materiales para la elaboración de loza, se comprará barro, leña, nacascol, y además tendrá disponibilidad de dinero para el transporte, éste credito le ayudara nuevamente para poder fortalecer negocio y poder continuar realizando el comercio de ollas, comales, sartenes.

Ella manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le dio una gran ayuda comprandose los materiales necesarios que hasta el momento le han permitido tener una buena producción en el negocio, su núcleo familiar se mantiene todos le colaboran para la elaboración de loza.
texts.en:
Santos has opted for a new loan to buy more supplies needed to make earthenware goods.  She will buy clay, firewood and nacazcol [organic, black dye] and will also have money available to pay transportation costs.  This loan will once again help her strengthen the business to continue selling pots, griddles and pans.

She states that the previous loan was a great help for her.  She bought the necessary supplies that have made it possible for her to have good production in her business to date.  Her nuclear family continues to collaborate with the manufacture of dinnerware.

loans.use: to buy clay, firewood and nacazcol [dye].

loans.name: Yasmeen's Group

texts.en:
Yasmeen is 30 years old, a hard working and independent woman. She is living in Punjab, Pakistan, with her husband, son and two daughters. Her husband is an engineer. Yasmeen works as a beautician in a beauty parlor. She has done different types of beautician courses and now she wants to open a new beauty salon of her own.  

For that reason, as a member of a six-person lending group, she has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan. On getting a profit from her business, she will  be able to generate some income for her family. Her husband is very glad to know that his wife is planning to start her own business. He assures her that he will be helping her in the business. She hopes that her business will be successful and she is very much thankful to both Brac and Kiva. 

Note: In the picture, Yasmeen is carrying a passbook in her hand.

loans.use: To open a new beauty salon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making viands.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: El señor Adrian tiene 35 años de edad, tiene tres dependientes esta casado, el cliente es una persona trabajadora se caso muy joven, hace 10 años atrás vivía en la población de Villa Quiroga con sus dos niños, sus hijos hacían una hora de caminata para poder llegar al colegio, por esta razón con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo lograron comprar un lote en la urbanización primero de mayo en Chimore, en donde tienen una casa actualmente sus hijos tienen mejores posibilidades para seguir estudiando pero el cliente quiere seguir ayudándolos  hasta que tengas estudios a nivel superior, para poder mantener a sus hijos la pareja trabaja en conjunto, su esposa vende helados cuando van a lugares lejanos el la acompaña, él trabaja como jornalero y también en el chaco, don Adrian busca seguir mejorando sus ingresos el necesita comprar equipos para disminuir las horas de trabajo en su parcela, y así mantener las plantaciones de cítrico y achiote que tiene.
texts.en:
Sr. Adrian is 35 years old, married, and has three people who are dependent on him. He is a hardworking individual who got married at a very young age. Ten years ago, he lived in the town of Villa Quiroga with his two children. His children had to walk an hour to school. For this reason, he bought a lot through great effort and work in the urban section of Chimore. He now lives in a house where his children have better opportunities to continue their studies. Adrian wants to continue assisting them so that they can pursue a higher education. In order to support their children, he and his wife must work and help one another. His wife sells ice cream whenever they have to travel to distance places for his work. Adrian is a farm laborer, but he also works in El Chaco.

He needs to improve his income, so Don Adrian wants to buy equipment so that he can reduce the numbers of hours that he works on the land. In addition, he grows citrus and achiote trees.

loans.use: to buy machinery for his farm work.

loans.name: Emilie

texts.en: Every day she is very optimistic that she can receive a gift through her business. Emilie is 42 years old and has one child. They live in Cauayan city in the province of Isabela. Emilie works hard for the fulfillment of their dreams in life. She is a vendor in the market. She sells different merchandise in order to earn a living. Some of her products include vegetables. She would like to request a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy fish sauce, vegetable oil, onions, garlic and salt to resell. She is always busy with her venture to earn a living. She wishes that somehow, someday, they can improve their poor living conditions so that her child and future families will not suffer so much from life's difficulties.

loans.use: to buy fish sauce, vegetable oil, onion, garlic and salt to resell

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en: Angelita, 57 years old, lives in the mountainous region of Isabela. She has been involved in the livestock business for 10 years. She manages a farm together with her husband and three adult-aged children. She is requesting a new loan to buy additional pigs to sustain the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs and feed for her business

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph, aged 36 years, is a married man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He owns a produce store in the same town a business he has done for three years having started with farming. Price fluctuations and inadequate capital are affecting the growth of his business. 

He dreams of building a permanent house for residence and educating his five children to attain degrees as a minimum qualification, while his business dream is to become the leading produce supplier in the region. Joseph is requesting a loan to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Dignora Del Carmen

texts.es: Dignora, esta solicitando un nuevo crédito para poder realizar la inversión en la compra de ropa nueva, para continuar vendiéndola, su compra será en ropa para niños como trajes y ropa interior, también invertirá en ropa interior para damas, este préstamo será una gran ayuda para que ella continúe manteniendo un buen nivel de inventarios, con el préstamo anterior logró tener una compra de ropa variada para el negocio, esto hasta el momento le ha permitido mantener sus ventas y poder crear ingresos para su familia, hace dos meses dio a luz a una niña la cual le demanda mayor trabajo.
texts.en: Dignora’s asking for a new loan to buy new clothes and continue selling it.  She will buy children’s clothes like outfits and underwear and will also buy women’s underwear.  This loan will be a big help in order for her to continue keeping a good level of inventory.  She was able to buy a good variety of clothes to sell with her previous loan which has allowed her to keep a good level of sales to date and increase family income.  She gave birth to a baby girl two months ago which demands more work.

loans.use: to buy outfits and underwear for children and adults.

loans.name: Maxim

texts.en:
Maxim is a 39-year-old married woman with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She deals in cocoa farming, and has been a farmer for 10 years. Her main challenge is changes in seasons that makes it had to predict the final output. 

Maxim's personal goal is educating her children up to university level while her business goal is expanding her business to new markets. She intends to use this loan facility to buy agrochemical sprays for the cocoa plantation.

loans.use: to buy agrochemical sprays for the cocoa plantation.

loans.name: Way

texts.en:
Way is 19 years old. He is single and resides with his mother in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. He has been making drums to sell for more than four years, earning approximately $8 per day. 

Way is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase wood to make more drums to sell. By doing so, he will produce more drums to sell and earn more income to financially support the family. 

In the future, he would like to purchase a generator and a lathe to use in his business and build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase wood to make more drums to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Ivan

texts.es: Carlos de 47 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos quienes dependen por completo de él. Carlos se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de café actividad que trata de realizar de la mejor forma posible trabajando muy duro para brindar el sustento diario en su hogar. El café logra comercializarlo a muy buenos precios ya que es de calidad, lo que es muy importante para Carlos debido a que de esta forma podrá obtener más ganancias. Carlos solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el fin de aprovechar al máximo la temporada de siembra y contar con fertilizantes para darle la fuerza y calidad necesaria a sus plantas, de modo que pueda asegurarse obtener un excelente producto, lo que le permita contar con nuevos clientes quienes a su vez lo recomienden con más personas por la excelencia y calidad con la que trabaja.
texts.en:
Carlos, 47, lives with his wife and three children who are completely dependent on him.  Carlos works growing coffee.  He tries to do this in the best possible way working very hard to provide daily sustenance for his home.  He sells the coffee at a very good price because it’s good quality which is very important to Carlos because this is how he’s able to earn more profits.

Carlos is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to take advantage of the season to the maximum and have fertilizer on hand to provide strength and quality needed by his plants so that he can insure that his final product is excellent leading to new customers who in turn will recommend him to still others because of the excellence and quality he handles.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Ruta

texts.en:
"Ruta is a 33-year-old married woman with 6 children.

She has a small plantation and grows taro, ta'amu (a root vegetable), bananas, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Ruta has requested a loan to pay for a grass-sprayer, chemicals, a knife, and barbed wire for her business. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Ruta hopes to improve her family living condition.

loans.use: to pay for grass-sprayer, chemicals, a knife, and barbed wire

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria  is a 20-year-old single woman with one child. She has a small business, a canteen. She is requesting this loan to buy rice, chicken, garlic onion and cooking oil for her business. In the future ,Maria will use her profit to renovate her house. Maria joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy rice, chicken, garlic onion and cooking oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
This is Catalina, 63, a resident of Manila, Philippines. She is married to Prudencio, and mother of three children. She, together with her husband and children, manage their own business to be able to cover their everyday expenses.

Catalina sells newspapers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php 200 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 15,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more newspaper needed in her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Catalina simply hopes to have good health and a happy life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more newspapers that she will need in her business.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.es: Imelda tiene 45 años y es madre de una hija de 20, con quien vive en el municipio de Soledad, área metropolitana de la ciudad de Barranquilla en la Costa Caribeña Colombiana. Hace 3 años que Imelda emprendió su propio negocio, mediante el  vende mercancías variadas, como ropa calzado y accesorios femeninos, los cuales comercializa entre  sus vecinos y otros clientes en el municipio de Soledad, donde tiene su domicilio. Imelda compra en  varios almacenes en Barranquilla sus mercancías, y estaría muy satisfecha, si pudiera comprar una mayor cantidad, pues aprovecharía descuentos y aumentaría sus ingresos. Ella tiene proyectado vender a más clientes y así hacer crecer su negocio, porque en este momento es bastante pequeño, pues debe esperar recuperar su dinero de cuentas por cobrar, para tener inventarios. Con un préstamo Imelda, conseguirá cumplir su meta de comprar mayores cantidades calzado, vestidos, bolsos, fantasias etc y así mismo podrá vender aun mas, por eso está acudiendo a su primer credikiva en la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, así  disminuiría los costos y su negocio sería aun mas rentables y estas son justamente las razones de éxito de su credikiva..
texts.en:
Imelda is 45 years old and is the mother of a 20 year old daughter who lives in the town of Soledad, a metropolitan area within the city of Baeeanquilla, on the Columbian Caribbean coast.  Three years ago, Imelda started her own business selling various products such as clothing, shoes, and ladies’ accessories to her neighbors and other customers in Soledad where she lives.

Imelda buys from various suppliers in Barranquilla and she is very satisfied.  If she could buy a large quantity, she could take advantage of discounts and therefore increase her income.  She expects to increase her customer base and expand her business because it’s small at the moment and she must wait to collect for her sales before she can invest in new inventory.

This loan will allow Imelda to achieve her goal of buying shoes, dresses, bags, accessories, etc in quantity.  In this way she will be able to sell more, so she is asking for her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will be able to decrease her costs and make her business more profitable; a success for her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en: Elvira is 45 years old, married, and blessed with four school-aged children. She has been operating her restaurant for two years. At first, she struggled to promote her restaurant because she was new in the business. But as time passed, she learned more about the business and how to attract customers. She earns 3,000 PHP every day and usually uses it for the education of her children. To increase sales, she is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy meat and vegetables to cook, and to buy dishes, glasses, and pottery to use in her restaurant. She hopes it will contribute to a better income in order to save for emergency and educational purposes.

loans.use: to buy meat and vegetables to cook, and to buy dishes, glasses, and pottery to use in her restaurant

loans.name: Maria Nive

texts.en: Maria is a 28-year-old married woman with six children. She has a small business, a mechanical shop. She is requesting this loan to buy spare tires, fluid oil , filter oil and vehicle registration fee. Maria Nive joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy spare tires, fluid oil , filter oil and vehicle registration fee

loans.name: Israel

texts.es: Israel de 63 años de edad, es un gran proveedor y esposo responsable y dedicado a su hogar, vive únicamente junto a su compañera de vida quien le ayuda a realizar el trabajo gracias al cual han logrado salir adelante. Israel se dedica al cultivo de maíz para luego comercializar en mercados y tiendas de granos básicos, cuenta con varios clientes fijos lo que es muy positivo para él. Israel solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar pesticidas y fertilizantes para lograr una cosecha sana que se pueda comercializar a muy buenos precios. Israel desea mucho poder tener una vida estable junto a su esposa por lo que ha trabajado muy duro durante muchos años y ahora con el préstamo obtenido a INTEGRAL, cuenta con la posibilidad de mejorar su negocio lo que es de mucho beneficio para su hogar.
texts.en:
Israel, 63, is a great provider and responsible husband who is dedicated to his home.  He lives only with his life partner who helps him do the work thanks to which they’ve succeeded in getting ahead.  

Israel grows corn to then sell in local markets and basic grain stores; he has several regular customers which is very positive for him.  Israel is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy pesticide and fertilizer to attain a healthy harvest that he will be able to sell for a very good price.  

Israel very much wants to have a stable life with his wife which is why he’s worked very hard for many years and now with the loan from INTEGRAL he has the possibility of improving his business which will have a very positive benefit for his home.

loans.use: to buy corn to plant.

loans.name: Dalia Marisol

texts.es:
Dalia, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio y también realizar algunas mejoras a su vivienda, invertirá específicamente en la compra de maíz, condimentos, chicharrón, aceite, bebidas, también invertirá en el mejoramiento del piso de la vivienda, instalándole ladrillo, este crédito será una gran ayuda que le permitirá mejorar el negocio y también su casa.

Con el préstamo anterior logró tener una buena inversión, ya que también realizó otras mejoras en su casa, en este tiempo ella ha enfrentado una situación dolorosa ya que hace cuatro meses su esposo falleció debido a problemas de salud, ella aún está enfrentando esta situación pero espera mantenerse ocupada para poder superarlo.
texts.en:
Dalia is requesting a new loan to be able to invest in the business and also to make some improvements to her home.  She will invest specifically in the purchase of corn, condiments, fried pork, oil and drinks.  She will also invest in the improvement of the floor of her house, installing bricks.  This loan will be a great help that will allow her to improve the business and also her home.

With the previous loan she managed to have a good investment as she also carried out other improvements in her house.  At this time she has faced a painful situation as four months ago her husband died due to health problems.  She is still facing this situation but she hopes to keep herself busy to be able to overcome it.

loans.use: to buy corn, condiments, fried pork, oil and drinks.

loans.name: Dalila

texts.es: Dalila de  47 años de edad, vive junto a su madre de 76 años de edad, y un pequeño hijo quien depende de ella por completo. Desde hace 15 años que Dalila se separó de su esposo, tiempo durante el cual ha trabajado muy duro por darle todo lo necesario a su hijo y su madre. Dalila trabaja como jornalera sembrando maíz y frijoles, los cuales posteriormente comercializa en diferentes zonas del país, este es un trabajo muy duro pero Dalila sabe realizar de la mejor manera. Ella solicita un préstamo con el deseo de invertir en la compra de semilla de frijol y maíz para sembrar, y así aumentar su producción con lo que espera aumentar sus ventas y mejorar su económica familiar.
texts.en: Dalila, 47, lives with her 76-year-old mother and young son who are completely dependent on her.  Since Dalila separated from her husband 15 years ago she’s been working hard to provide her son and mother everything they need.  Dalila works as a day laborer planting corn and beans which she subsequently sells in various zones in the country.  This is very hard work but Dalila knows how to do it in the best possible way.  She’s requesting a loan to buy bean and corn seeds to plant and increase production hoping to increase sales and improve her family economy.

loans.use: to buy bean and corn seeds.

loans.name: David Anselmo
